Back to Franz Schubert

Franz Schubert

Four Impromptus, D 899

1827 · op. 90

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

Total duration: 27' 30"

  • 1. C minor
  • 2. E-flat major
  • 3. G-flat major
  • 4. A-flat major

Recommended editions

  • Neue Schubert-Ausgabe (Bärenreiter) · VII/2/5 · BA 5521 · Klavierstücke II · ed. Christa Landon / Walther Dürr [including earlier sketch of no. 1]
  • Associated Board · ed. Howard Ferguson
  • Bärenreiter · BA 9648 · Impromptus · ed. Walther Dürr
  • Henle · HN 4 · Impromptus / Moments musicaux · ed. Walter Gieseking
  • Henle · HN 138 · Impromptus / Moments musicaux · ed. Walter Gieseking
  • Wiener Urtext · UT 50297 · Impromptus und Moments musicaux · ed. Ulrich Leisinger / Paul Badura-Skoda
  • Wiener Urtext · UT 50408 · ed. Ulrich Leisinger

1. C minor

Duration: 9' 30"

Difficulty: 3

2. E-flat major

Duration: 4' 30"

Difficulty: 3

3. G-flat major

Duration: 5' 30"

Difficulty: 3

4. A-flat major

Duration: 8'

Difficulty: 3
